COVID-19 and Flu Vaccines

Please be advised that the COVID-19 and flu vaccines are currently not yet available. Please continue checking our website and social media for updates. TLCHD is also in the process of planning community clinics and, if available, will include both

Lucas County Opiate Coalition Hosts 6th Annual Chalk the Walk

Each year, hundreds of people in Lucas County die due to opioid-related overdose and injury. The Lucas County Opiate Coalition invites the community to an event on International Overdose Awareness Day in remembrance of all who have lost a life

Read More

Health Department Celebrates August as Breastfeeding Awareness Month

The month of August is recognized as Breastfeeding Awareness Month in Ohio, and the Toledo-Lucas County Health Department is pleased to celebrate this important month with multiple community events.Research indicates that breastfeeding significantly impacts the rate of diseases in both
